source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000010_YDA<tab>We're here! Did we miss anything?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000010_YDA<tab>Coucou<var 1D /var>! J'ai trouvé notre aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère préférée)) ((er préféré)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>We would not presume to begin without you, Yda.
Urianger has returned to the Waking Sands, but everyone else is now present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci, Yda. Urianger manque malheureusement à l'appel, mais nous ferons sans lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000030_ALISAIE<tab>Yes, but for <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>, exactly? We all have duties to attend to, Alphinaud, so you may dispense with the preamble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000030_ALISAIE<tab>Alors, tu vas enfin nous expliquer la raison de notre présence en ces lieux, ou tu vas encore nous faire patienter une semaine<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you, Alisaie. It is the very subject of those duties which compelled me to call this gathering. Though the Warriors of Darkness no longer pose a threat, Eorzea's many troubles demand no less of our attention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Désolé... Comme vous le savez, les Guerriers des Ténèbres ont quitté notre monde, mais de nombreuses menaces pèsent toujours sur Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>And while I stand by the decision to approach each task as we see fit, I fear our effectiveness will ultimately be diminished should we continue to act in ignorance of each other's efforts. Thus I propose we elect a successor to Minfilia─not to serve as a fully fledged Antecedent, perhaps, but as a coordinator of operations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nos activités respectives nous tiennent éloignés les uns des autres, et je crains qu'en l'absence d'un chef, les Héritiers ne soient plus aussi efficaces qu'avant. Voilà pourquoi je pense qu'il est nécessaire d'élire un successeur à Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000060_ALISAIE<tab>Is that all? Then the decision seems clear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000060_ALISAIE<tab>La coordination est ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment fondamentale pour garantir le succès d'une in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion. Dans ce cas-là, je crois que la solution est toute trouvée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000070_ALISAIE<tab>No one else has shown any enthusiasm for the role. And judging by your performance at our previous meeting, you would seem the perfect candidate. You always did have a flair for politics.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000070_ALISAIE<tab>Personne n'a l'air intéressé par ce poste. Et puis, pour être honnête, je crois que tout le monde pensait na<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment que tu prendrais la relève. Après tout, tu es calé en diplomatie et tu es doué pour les longs discours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>I-I did not mean to─ That was not my intention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qui ça<var 1D /var>? Moi<var 1D /var>!? Ah, non merci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000090_ALPHINAUD<tab>As my tenure as commander of the Crystal Braves comprehensively demonstrated, I lack the qualities required for such an office. I would much prefer to remain as I am now─a soldier in the field, so to speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ma brève expérience à la tête des Braves du Cristal m'a vacciné à vie<var 1D /var>! Je n'ai pas l'étoffe d'un meneur d'hommes<var 1D /var>; je préfère rester un simple exécutant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000100_YSHTOLA<tab>Should none of our number step forward, must we then constrain some unwilling candidate to take up the position?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000100_YSHTOLA<tab>Si personne n'a envie d'assumer le rôle de chef au sein du groupe, peut-être pouvons-nous essayer de faire sans<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000110_THANCRED<tab>Well, based on merit alone, a certain adventurer would be my choice─though I concede <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> might struggle to balance <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> new responsibilities with, let me see...slaying primals, thwarting legatuses, and feeding the orphaned poor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000110_THANCRED<tab>En termes de mérite, notre <var 08 E905 ((amie aventurière)) ((ami aventurier)) /var> est sans aucun doute la personne la plus digne de remplir ce rôle, mais ce serait cruel de lui faire endosser cette res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té en plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000120_PAPALYMO<tab>Thancred makes a good point. Any who would wear such a mantle would be bound by its obligations. Have we not become sufficiently familiar with each other's methods to act without an overseer? At present, I see no cause to so willingly limit one of our number.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000120_PAPALYMO<tab>En effet, assurer cette fonction revient à tirer un trait sur sa liberté... Je doute que quiconque d'entre nous soit prêt à mettre ses activités de côté pour le moment. Et à vrai dire, je ne crois pas que ce soit nécessaire, puisque les choses tournent relativement bien malgré l'absence d'un meneur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000130_TATARU<tab>Oh! Oh, my goodness! You're─ Help! I need some help here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000130_TATARU<tab>Au secours<var 1D /var>! J'ai besoin d'aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tataru! Are you all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Que s'est-il passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000150_TATARU<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Me<var 1A 01 /var>!? I'm fine! It's this poor girl who just staggered in and collapsed on the floor that I'm worried about!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000150_TATARU<tab>Je... Je vaquais tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment à mes occupations quand cette femme est entrée et s'est écroulée sous mes yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000160_YDA<tab>Naago!? Gods, how did─ Y'shtola, please, you have to help her!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000160_YDA<tab>M'naago<var 1D /var>!? Mais qu'est-ce qu'elle fait ici<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Y'shtola, je t'en supplie, fais quelque chose pour elle<var 1D /var>! C'est mon amie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Krile, a hand if you would. Let us see about closing these wounds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Je m'occupe d'elle. Krile, tu veux bien me donner un coup de main, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>? À nous deux, nous pourrons la soigner plus rapidement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000180_KRILE<tab>Now, we've staunched the bleeding, but it may be a while before you can move about again. Though, having seen your wounds, I'm surprised you were still moving at all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000180_KRILE<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, nous avons réussi à stopper l'hémorragie. Tu as eu beaucoup de chance, tu sais... Un peu plus et tu y passais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000190_MNAAGO<tab>Thank you... My message... It was too important to delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000190_MNAAGO<tab>Merci pour votre aide... J'étais consciente du danger que je courrrais, mais je n'avais pas le choix... Je me devais de faire aussi vite que possible...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000200_MNAAGO<tab>I took the shortest route I could, though I knew it was more heavily patrolled... As you can see, my efforts at evasion were not entirely successful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000200_MNAAGO<tab>J'ai emprunté une route gardée par les Garlemaldais pour gagner du temps, mais ils m'ont découverte... C'est ce qui explique le triste état dans lequel vous m'avez trrrouvée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000210_YDA<tab>Honestly, you're too brave for your own good! What was so urgent that you needed to fight half the Empire to get here? You could have been killed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000210_YDA<tab>Tout ce qui compte, c'est que tu sois vivante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000220_MNAAGO<tab>I'm sorry, Yda. I had good reason... Ah, but I imagine your friends are wondering who this bloody mess of a Miqo'te is. My name is M'naago, and I belong to the Ala Mhigan Resistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000220_MNAAGO<tab>Merci, Yda... Héritiers de la Septième Aube, permettez-moi de me présenter<var 1D /var>: je m'appelle M'naago et j'appartiens à l'armée de libération mhigoise. Je suis venue jusqu'ici pour vous transmettrrre une information de la plus haute importance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000230_MNAAGO<tab>I came to warn Yda and Papalymo about one of our leaders─a man who calls himself the Griffin. He's always been dangerous, but he's planning something new...something reckless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000230_MNAAGO<tab>Le Griffon a l'intention de lancer une nouvelle opération qui pourrait mettre en péril des milliers de vies à travers Éorrrzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000240_THANCRED<tab>The Griffin, you say? I've heard the name. Rumor has it, your man is eager to test his claws.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000240_THANCRED<tab>Le Griffon... Si je ne me trompe pas, il s'agit du mystérieux personnage qui a récemment pris la tête du mouvement anti-impérialiste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000250_MNAAGO<tab>Aye, and on no easy target. He means to assault Baelsar's Wall from the Ala Mhigan side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000250_MNAAGO<tab>C'est exact. Ses hommes et lui prrrojettent d'assiéger la Muraille de Baelsar du côté mhigois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000260_PAPALYMO<tab>But what does the Griffin possibly hope to gain from such an attack?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000260_PAPALYMO<tab>La Muraille de Baelsar<var 1D /var>? L'immense rempart qui marque la frontière entre Gridania et Ala Mhigo<var 1D /var>? Mais pourquoi feraient-ils une chose pareille<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000270_MNAAGO<tab>From what I understand, he wants the fires of war to spread to Eorzea. And for that, he needs to control the border with Gridania.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000270_MNAAGO<tab>Nous pensons qu'ils cherchent à la détrrruire dans le but d'étendre le conflit vers Éorzéa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000280_ALPHINAUD<tab>...So he means to spark a conflict between the Alliance and the imperial forces stationed in Ala Mhigo─to have Eorzea's armies aid in the liberation effort, whether they will it or no.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000280_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ils voudraient donc provoquer une guerre entre les troupes d'occupation garlemaldaises et les soldats de l'Alliance éorzéenne pour soutenir leur campagne de libération...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000290_PAPALYMO<tab>His plan is flawed. Even should the Resistance succeed in occupying the Wall, they would not be able to hold it. Imperial reinforcements would drive them out within a week!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000290_PAPALYMO<tab>C'est de la pure folie<var 1D /var>! En admettant qu'ils arrivent à s'emparer de l'édifice, il est évident que les Impériaux enverront im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment des renforts pour le récupérer. Ils ne sont pas de taille contre l'armée garlemaldaise<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000300_KRILE<tab>Be that as it may, if there is even a chance that this scheme could bring about an escalation in hostilities between Eorzea and the Empire, the Alliance must be informed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000300_KRILE<tab>Cette affaire sent mauvais, mais nous ne pouvons pas ignorer ces in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions. Nous devons les transmettre aux dirigeants des cités-États aussi vite que possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000310_YSHTOLA<tab>Agreed. I shall depart for Limsa Lominsa forthwith and seek an audience with the Admiral. Thancred─Ul'dah is yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000310_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu as raison. Je m'occupe de prévenir l'amirale Bloefhiswyn. Thancred, je te laisse contacter le général Aldynn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000320_YSHTOLA<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie─make haste to the Twelveswood, and notify the Elder Seedseer of the danger to Gridania. She will duly call a council of the Alliance leaders, whom you must be ready to receive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000320_YSHTOLA<tab>Alphinaud et Alisaie, rendez-vous im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment auprès de Kan-E-Senna et expliquez-lui la situation, s'il vous plaît. Du fait de sa position, Gridania est la cité qui court le plus grand danger. Il faut donc que l'Oracle se prépare au pire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000330_YSHTOLA<tab>You will be our voice in Ishgard. Explain the situation to Ser Aymeric, and encourage him to send an envoy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000330_YSHTOLA<tab>Quant à toi, il faudrait que tu ailles à Ishgard afin d'y retrouver Aymeric. Au vu de ses nouvelles res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés, je doute qu'il puisse se déplacer en personne, mais il faudra qu'il désigne un émissaire pour représenter la sainte Cité lors de l'assemblée ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nelle qui se tiendra à Gridania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>Tataru, Krile─I leave the care of our injured messenger to you. See that she remains quiescent and her wounds closed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>Tataru, Krile, je vous confie M'naago. Ses blessures sont à peine cicatrisées, donc veillez bien sur elle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000350_YSHTOLA<tab>I believe that covers everything. Let us be about our tasks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000350_YSHTOLA<tab>Si personne n'a de question, je propose que nous nous mettions tous au travail.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000360_PAPALYMO<tab>I suspect the ill tidings from Gyr Abania will be held as a turning point─the beginning to a bloody end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000360_PAPALYMO<tab>À bien y réfléchir, l'inquiétante nouvelle que nous avons reçue de Gyr Abania
était cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment le signe qui annonçait le début de la fin...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000370_PAPALYMO<tab>The business of war was ever conducted with the coin of self-sacrifice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000370_PAPALYMO<tab>Il n'y a pas de guerre sans sacrifices. La réalité est cruelle
et celui qui refuse de l'accepter ne peut remporter la bataille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000380_PAPALYMO<tab>'Twas Master Louisoix himself who taught us that such costs are not to be ignored or denied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000380_PAPALYMO<tab>J'ignore pourquoi, mais ces mots de maître Louisoix résonnaient dans ma tête à ce moment-là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000390_PAPALYMO<tab>And so I shall embrace them. When the time comes, I will make my choice─as you will yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000390_PAPALYMO<tab>J'ai fait un choix<var 1D /var>: celui d'aller au bout de mes convictions,
quel qu'en soit le prix à payer<var 1D /var>; et toi aussi, tu dois en faire de même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000400_KANESENNA<tab>I bid you welcome, my friends. As you will by now be aware, the Scions of the Seventh Dawn have come into possession of certain intelligence concerning recent developments in the region of Gyr Abania. It springs, I am assured, from an unimpeachable source─is that not so, Master Alphinaud?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000400_KANESENNA<tab>Tout d'abord, permettez-moi de vous souhaiter la bienvenue à Gridania. Nous sommes réunis ici aujourd'hui car quelque chose de grave se trame du côté de Gyr Abania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, Elder Seedseer. Our information comes directly from a member of the Resistance's inner circle, and we have no cause to doubt its veracity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>En effet. Les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions que nous vous avons relayées viennent directement d'un membre de l'armée de libération mhigoise. Il n'y a donc pas lieu de douter de leur véracité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000420_RAUBAHN<tab>This “Griffin” of theirs is a fool if he thinks he can hold Baelsar's Wall against the Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000420_RAUBAHN<tab>Même si ce Griffon arrive à prendre la Muraille de force, il ne pourra pas la conserver longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000430_RAUBAHN<tab>When the imperials move to take it back, they will come in force─and the resulting fighting is all but certain to spill over into the Black Shroud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000430_RAUBAHN<tab>Ce qui m'inquiète, c'est que les troupes envoyées pour récupérer la fortification pourraient profiter de l'occasion pour déferler en nombre sur Sombrelinceul.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000440_KANESENNA<tab>At the Battle of Carteneau, the combined might of three Grand Companies labored to contend with the remnants of but a single imperial legion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000440_KANESENNA<tab>Lors de la bataille de Carteneau, l'Alliance éorzéenne a tout juste réussi à faire jeu égal avec les survivants de la 7e légion impériale...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000450_KANESENNA<tab>Alone, Gridania would be hard-pressed indeed to hold back the tide should the Garleans turn their minds from reclamation to invasion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000450_KANESENNA<tab>Gridania seule ne pourra jamais résister à une attaque massive de l'Empire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000460_AYMERIC<tab>May I once more convey my nation's deepest regrets for our inaction in the days prior to the Calamity. 'Tis a stain upon our ledger that I would fain remove.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000460_AYMERIC<tab>Il y a cinq ans, le Saint-Siège a ignoré les appels à l'aide de l'Alliance éorzéenne. Je tiens d'ailleurs à vous présenter mes plus sincères excuses pour ce que je considère être un acte d'une bassesse sans pareille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000470_AYMERIC<tab>Elder Seedseer─I do hereby request leave to deploy a defensive force within the borders of Gridania. Ishgard's return to the Alliance shall be honored by more than mere ink upon parchment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000470_AYMERIC<tab>Ishgard a changé depuis, et elle ne laissera pas ses alliés seuls face au danger. À ce titre, je suis prêt à envoyer un bataillon d'infanterie pour renforcer les rangs de l'armée gridanienne, si dame Kan-E-Senna m'en donne l'au<var 16 /var>to<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion, bien sûr...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000480_YUGIRI<tab>The Doman people, too, would join any effort that weakens our common foe. We are few, but our most seasoned shinobi are at your disposal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000480_YUGIRI<tab>L'empire de Garlemald est l'ennemi juré des Domiens. Nous n'avons pas autant de ressources que les Ishgardais, mais nous pouvons malgré tout mettre quelques-uns de nos meilleurs éléments à votre disposition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000490_KANESENNA<tab>On behalf of my people, I offer you my humble thanks. Gridania welcomes your assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000490_KANESENNA<tab>Merci à tous les deux. J'accepte volontiers vos offres respectives.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000500_RAUBAHN<tab>It is time we set our contingency plans in motion. Is the Alliance agreed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000500_RAUBAHN<tab>Bien, je propose que nous élaborions un plan d'action au cas où l'Alliance devrait entrer en guerre. Êtes-vous d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000510_RAUBAHN<tab>Then let us make ready for war. Victory favors the swift, and there is much to be done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000510_RAUBAHN<tab>Dans ce cas-là, mettons-nous sans attendre au travail<var 1D /var>! N'oublions pas que la victoire appartient à ceux dont le jugement est prompt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000520_ALISAIE<tab>The council knows that Ala Mhigo will not soon be wrested from the Empire, and its decision to bolster the border's defenses seems eminently practical. Why, then, Brother, do you scowl so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000520_ALISAIE<tab>Je suppose que c'est le choix de raison. La solution idéale serait bien évidemment de chasser les Impériaux hors d'Ala Mhigo, mais nous n'en avons pas les moyens... Qu'est-ce que tu en penses, Alphinaud<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000530_ALPHINAUD<tab>I agree that they have chosen the wisest course available. Indeed, the only reasonable one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je suis du même avis que toi. Les dirigeants ont pris la meilleure décision possible dans ces cir<var 16 /var>cons<var 16 /var>tan<var 16 /var>ces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yet something feels awry. In making ready for war, is the Alliance not granting the Griffin the very thing he desired? Any attempt to hold the Wall is doomed to failure, aye, but I wonder if we have misjudged the prize for which he plays...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Toutefois, j'ai le sentiment d'avoir manqué un détail important... J'ai peur que nous fassions exactement ce que le Griffon attend de nous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000550_ILBERD<tab><pant> <pant> You've beaten me, aye...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000550_ILBERD<tab>Tu m'as peut-être mis au tapis, mais tu n'as pas gagné pour autant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000551_ILBERD<tab>But you cannot stop what I've begun. Behold─a glimpse of things to come!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000551_ILBERD<tab>Mon plan est déjà en marche et rien ne pourra l'arrêter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000560_SOLDIERA02354<tab>We did it! We showed the bastards!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000560_SOLDIERA02354<tab>On a réussi<var 1D /var>! On a vaincu les Impériaux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000570_SOLDIERB02354<tab>Aye! Victory is ours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000570_SOLDIERB02354<tab>Ouais<var 1D /var>! On leur a donné une leçon qu'ils oublieront pas de sitôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000580_SOLDIERC02354<tab>And who knows, lads? Mayhap the Eorzeans'll finally see sense...when the enemy turns up on their <var 1A 02 /var>bloody doorstep<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000580_SOLDIERC02354<tab>Les Éorzéens vont enfin comprendre qui est leur vrai ennemi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000590_LAURENTIUS<tab>This is for Ala Mhigo... For Eorzea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000590_LAURENTIUS<tab>J'ai pas le choix... J-je dois le faire... C'est la seule façon de libérer Ala Mhigo, de sauver Éorzéa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000600_LAURENTIUS<tab>They die, that others may live...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000600_LAURENTIUS<tab>Oui, ces sacrifices sont in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000610_LAURENTIUS<tab>Vanguards! Attack!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000610_LAURENTIUS<tab>Je dois le faire... JE DOIS LE FAIRE<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000620_SOLDIERC02354<tab>Seven hells, d'ye hear that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000620_SOLDIERC02354<tab>C'est quoi, ce bruit<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000630_SOLDIERB02354<tab>War machines... How did they get here so quickly!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000630_SOLDIERB02354<tab>C'est pas possible<var 1D /var>! Les renforts sont déjà là<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000640_SOLDIERA02354<tab>S-Stand your ground! For the Resistance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000640_SOLDIERA02354<tab>Il faut les détruire, sinon on est cuits<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000650_SOLDIERC02354<tab>There's nowhere to run! We're cut off!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000650_SOLDIERC02354<tab>Nous sommes cernés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000660_SOLDIERC02354<tab>Aaagh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000660_SOLDIERC02354<tab>Aaaaahhhh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000670_SOLDIERA02354<tab>Gods help us... What were we thinking? The Empire's too big... Too powerful...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000670_SOLDIERA02354<tab>On aurait jamais dû les provoquer... On fait pas le poids face à l'Empire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000680_SOLDIERA02354<tab>Mighty Rhalgr... Grant us...the <var 1A 02 /var>strength<var 1A 01 /var>...to crush...our...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000680_SOLDIERA02354<tab>Plus de force... Il nous faut plus de force... pour les vaincre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000690_PAPALYMO<tab>There you are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000690_PAPALYMO<tab>Dieux merci, tu n'as rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000700_ALPHINAUD<tab>As you can see, our infiltrators did not elude me for long. Lady Yugiri is sending for an airship even as we speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça n'a pas été facile, mais j'ai réussi à rejoindre l'équipe d'in<var 16 /var>fil<var 16 /var>tra<var 16 /var>tion. Dame Yugiri est restée derrière pour coordonner les opérations d'évacuation par aéronef.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000710_YDA<tab>What do we do!? This is a massacre!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000710_YDA<tab>C'est horrible... Les membres de la résistance se sont fait massacrer par les Impériaux...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000720_ILBERD<tab>Heh heh heh heh... How wonderful to see you...<var 1A 02 /var>Commander<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000720_ILBERD<tab>Hin hin hin... Regardez qui voilà<var 1D /var>: Son Excellence le Commandant Leveilleur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ilberd! I should have known...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ilberd<var 1D /var>!! C'était donc toi qui te cachais sous ce masque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>This has to end! It has to end <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>! Do you not see your countrymen dying? Have your ideals rendered you blind even to that!? Order the retreat, and we will help your soldiers to safety!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ouvre les yeux<var 1D /var>! Ta foi t'empêche de voir la vérité en face<var 1D /var>! Tu conduis tes hommes tout droit à la mort<var 1D /var>! Ordonne la retraite avant qu'il ne soit trop tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000750_ILBERD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Retreat<var 1A 01 /var>? With the moment of my triumph so close at hand? You truly are a sheltered child, Leveilleur.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000750_ILBERD<tab>La retraite<var 1D /var>!? Tu voudrais qu'on abandonne la bataille alors que la victoire nous tend les bras<var 1D /var>? Hah<var 1D /var>! Tu n'as décidément rien appris depuis ton fiasco à la tête des Braves du Cristal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nidhogg's eyes! ...No abyss is too deep for you, I see. But trust me when I say that such power was not meant for mortal hands!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les Yeux du dragon<var 1D /var>!? C'est impossible<var 1D /var>! Nous les avons pourtant jetés au fin fond de la Mer de nuages<var 1D /var>! Ilberd, lâche-les im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>! Ces artefacts sont trop dangereux pour être manipulés par un simple humain<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000770_ILBERD<tab>How long have I struggled to reach this point! My countrymen so inured to the taste of defeat, they no longer balk at its bitterness. Shouting my throat raw with rallying cries, only to be greeted with dull eyes and blank faces!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000770_ILBERD<tab>Les affres du temps sont trop marquées... Les Mhigois se sont habitués à l'humiliation de la défaite, à l'esclavage forcé, à la certitude de connaître un sort funeste... Ils ont perdu tout espoir de retrouver leur vie d'antan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000780_ILBERD<tab>My “brothers” and “sisters” in Ul'dah have surrendered to their apathy and their appetites. Were it not for the glint of Lolorito's coin, I doubt even those here now would have answered my call!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000780_ILBERD<tab>La plupart de ceux qui ont fui dans le Thanalan attendent passivement qu'un miracle se produise au lieu de se battre... Ceux qui sont là aujourd'hui n'auraient jamais eu le courage de passer à l'acte sans l'aide de Lolorito<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000790_ILBERD<tab>"Take back our homeland! Free Ala Mhigo!“ Hah! They'll happily mouth the words, but they won't spill the blood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000790_ILBERD<tab>C'est facile de dire qu'on va aller combattre l'envahisseur, qu'on va libérer notre pays, mais la seule façon d'y arriver, c'est en étant prêt à tout sacrifier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000800_ILBERD<tab>You say no mortal should wield these eyes? Then I shall gladly become a demon! I will suckle on the souls of the hopeless, and liberate the homeland they no longer deserve!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000800_ILBERD<tab>Si un humain ne peut résister à la puissance de ces Yeux, alors je suis prêt à me transformer en monstre pour jouir de leur pouvoir<var 1D /var>! Qu'ils déchiquettent ma chair, qu'ils s'abreuvent de mon sang, qu'ils dévorent mon cœur meurtri<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>What exactly do you mean to do...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qu'as-tu donc l'intention de faire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000820_ILBERD<tab>Did you hear their cries as victory was snatched away from them? Even with their dying breaths they cursed the Empire! Never has their desire for vengeance been so raw, so true! A god has no need of faith when <var 1A 02 /var>summoned<var 1A 01 /var> by so pure a purpose!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000820_ILBERD<tab>La lamentation déchirante du désespoir... La haine à l'égard de l'Empire... Le désir de puissance... Ces sentiments purs et ces ferventes supplications face à la certitude de la mort vont me permettre d'appeler un nouveau dieu affranchi de tout dogme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000830_PAPALYMO<tab>Summoned!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000830_PAPALYMO<tab>Un nouveau dieu... affranchi de tout dogme<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>You cannot mean to fight the Empire with a primal! You know full well the danger─the <var 1A 02 /var>futility<var 1A 01 /var> of relying on such power!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ne sois pas stupide, Ilberd<var 1D /var>! Tu sais très bien que tu ne pourras jamais venir à bout de l'Empire, même avec le pouvoir d'un Primordial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000850_ILBERD<tab>Oh, yes, I know their limitations─which is why I will call upon a deity more terrible than the very black wyrm of the Calamity itself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000850_ILBERD<tab>C'est vrai... Et c'est justement pour ça que je dois invoquer un Primordial encore plus puissant que le grand dragon qui a provoqué le septième fléau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000860_PAPALYMO<tab>What... Here!? Now!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000860_PAPALYMO<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Il ne va pas l'invoquer ici, quand même<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000870_YDA<tab>Like hells you will!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000870_YDA<tab>Pas question de le laisser faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000880_ILBERD<tab>An ending to mark a new beginning...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000880_ILBERD<tab>C'est le début de la fin...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000881_ILBERD<tab>For Ala Mhigo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000881_ILBERD<tab>Pour Ala Mhigooo<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000890_ILBERD<tab>An ending to mark a new beginning... My pain! My longing! You shall have it all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000890_ILBERD<tab>C'est le début de la fin<var 1D /var>! Vous allez connaître mon désespoir et ma douleur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000891_ILBERD<tab>Hahaha─aaaaaaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000891_ILBERD<tab>Mouahahahaha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000900_ALPHINAUD<tab>This light, is it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'est<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000910_PAPALYMO<tab>His death completed the ritual. The primal is taking shape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000910_PAPALYMO<tab>Par tous les diables, le rite a abouti<var 1D /var>! L'invocation a commencé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000920_YDA<tab>Well, can't we stop it!? There must be something we can do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000920_YDA<tab>Oh non<var 1D /var>! Papalymo, il faut faire quelque chose<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000930_PAPALYMO<tab>There is...one thing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000930_PAPALYMO<tab>Oui... Il faut faire quelque chose...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000940_YDA<tab>Wha─? Hey! Where do you think you're going!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000940_YDA<tab>Attends<var 1D /var>! Tu ne vas pas toi aussi te jeter dans le vide<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000950_PAPALYMO<tab>Master Louisoix briefly contained Bahamut by means of a potent spell of sealing. I will now attempt to do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000950_PAPALYMO<tab>Mais non, nigaude<var 1D /var>! Je vais tenter de lancer le sort de scellement que Louisoix a utilisé lors du septième fléau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>But that's impossible! We would need hours to collect the necessary aether, i-if not days!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce sortilège est ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment puissant<var 1D /var>! Vous ne pourrez jamais le lancer sans un minimum de préparatifs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000970_PAPALYMO<tab>Ah, Alphinaud... Though I concede it may not always be apparent, I was ever your grandsire's finest pupil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000970_PAPALYMO<tab>Alphinaud... Je n'en ai peut-être pas l'air, mais je suis le plus doué des disciples de Louisoix Leveilleur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tupsimati, of course! The staff still holds enormous power, broken or not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tupsimati<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Avec ce bâton, il devrait être possible de concentrer suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment d'éther<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000990_YDA<tab>Don't you dare, Papalymo! I know how that spell works!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_000990_YDA<tab>Il doit y avoir une autre solution<var 1D /var>! Cette magie est trop dangereuse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001000_YUGIRI<tab>It is time to leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001000_YUGIRI<tab>Montez à bord<var 1D /var>! Vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001010_PAPALYMO<tab>Quite right! Quickly, now! Off you go! The further away the better!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001010_PAPALYMO<tab>Dépêchez-vous<var 1D /var>! J'ignore ce qui va se passer exactement, alors fuyez avant qu'il ne soit trop tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001020_YDA<tab>No! If you're staying, then so am I!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001020_YDA<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Si tu restes, je reste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001030_PAPALYMO<tab>No, Yda! There is a path only you can walk, and it must not end here─not like this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001030_PAPALYMO<tab>Ne dis pas de sottises<var 1D /var>! Tu as une mission, je te rappelle<var 1D /var>! Une mission que toi seule peux accomplir<var 1D /var>! Alors vas-y<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001040_PAPALYMO<tab>Take her! Please, you have to take her!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001040_PAPALYMO<tab>S'il vous plaît, emmenez-la en sécurité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ugh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tss<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001060_YDA<tab>Wha─ No! Damn it, Thancred! Put me down! Thancred!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001060_YDA<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Arrête, Thancred<var 1D /var>! Lâche-moi<var 1D /var>! Je veux rester<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001070_PAPALYMO<tab>This is one battle you cannot fight. Away with you. Go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001070_PAPALYMO<tab>Toi aussi, tu dois partir<var 1D /var>! Va<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que voulez-vous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Trust in Papalymo and leave on the airship.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Laisser Papalymo gérer la situation

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Stay at Papalymo's side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Rester aux côtés de Papalymo

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001080_THANCRED<tab>Hilda! I think he means now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001080_THANCRED<tab>Merde<var 1D /var>! Vas-y, Hilda<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001090_PAPALYMO<tab>I bid thee farewell again, my dear Yda...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001090_PAPALYMO<tab>Adieu, mon amie... Toi aussi, tu as été une formidable partenaire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001091_PAPALYMO<tab>Now, let us see how good a student I truly was...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001091_PAPALYMO<tab>Bon, le moment de vérité est arrivé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001100_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)A word if you would, good sir. This place, it is within the realm of Eorzea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001100_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Excusez-moi, mon brave, pourriez-vous me dire si je suis bien en “Éorzéa”<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001110_PASSER02356<tab>You're an odd-looking fellow, aren't you? Still...takes all sorts, I s'pose. This here's Vesper Bay─“Thanalan's door to the ocean,” as some folk like to call it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001110_PASSER02356<tab>Euh... Vous êtes à la baie des Vêpres, dans le Thanalan occidental.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001120_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)Am I to understand from your answer that I have indeed arrived in Eorzea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001120_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Non, non, non<var 1D /var>! Vous ne m'avez pas compris. Je vous demande si je suis bien en “É-or-zé-a”<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001130_PASSER02356<tab>Eh? ...Yes. You're in Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001130_PASSER02356<tab>Ah, eh bien, o-oui... Ici, c'est Éorzéa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001140_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)Ah, a plain response at last! And the one I wanted, at that! My journey was not without its hardships, and I would sooner travel by land than put to sea again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001140_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Merci, l'ami<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Haha<var 1D /var>! Je l'ai fait<var 1D /var>! J'en ai bavé comme pas permis, mais je l'ai fait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001150_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)You do not believe that so small a bark could bear me across the ocean? Such timid little sailors! I had but to set my course, then set my jaw till I made port!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001150_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Et ces idiots de marins qui m'assuraient qu'il était impossible de voguer sur la mer avec une embarcation de cette taille-là... Pfeu<var 1D /var>! Tout est possible avec de la motivation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001160_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)Hah hah hah hah hah hah hah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001160_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Ah ha ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001170_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)Though...'twould perhaps have been wise to lay down my oars a moment to sup on more than the spray of brinewater. By the trembling of my limbs, I sense a brief repast may be in order...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001170_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)En attendant, ce voyage m'a com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment vidé. Il faut dire que je suis resté longtemps sans boire ni manger... Je vais devoir trouver de quoi me mettre sous la dent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001180_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)Nay! I will not hearken to the feeble grumblings of an empty belly! Duty comes before all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001180_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Non<var 1D /var>! Je dois résister à la tentation<var 1D /var>! Ma mission passe avant tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001190_PASSER02356<tab>Good gods, man! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001190_PASSER02356<tab>Eh<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Ça va<var 1D /var>? Vous m'entendez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001200_URIANGER<tab>Thou art far indeed from home, friend...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001200_URIANGER<tab>Hmm... Cet accoutrement me rappelle quelqu'un...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001210_KANESENNA<tab>Dear friends...pray accept my heartfelt thanks for your efforts in defense of Gridania's borders. I would fain dwell longer on my gratitude for the support of the Alliance, but the situation at Baelsar's Wall demands that we forgo such pleasantries.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001210_KANESENNA<tab>Chers amis... La situation est critique, aussi me permettrai-je d'entrer sans tarder dans le vif du sujet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001220_BODYGUARD01623<tab>According to our most recent intelligence, the cocoon of light that formed in the air above the Wall remains undimmed and unbroken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001220_BODYGUARD01623<tab>Le cocon de lumière qui est apparu au-dessus de la Muraille de Baelsar est toujours présent dans le ciel et il ne semble pas avoir bougé d'un ilm.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001230_BODYGUARD01623<tab>After measuring the cocoon's aetheric concentrations, Archon Y'shtola has confirmed the presence of a primal entity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001230_BODYGUARD01623<tab>D'après le rapport d'observation de dame Y'shtola, il renfermerait une con<var 16 /var>cen<var 16 /var>tra<var 16 /var>tion d'éther aussi dense que celle d'un Primordial.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001240_RAUBAHN<tab>Hmph. So we must assume that Ilberd's thrice-damned god is indeed trapped within. And what news of the imperials? They are not like to ignore such a spectacle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001240_RAUBAHN<tab>Hmm, le Primordial que ce salaud d'Ilberd a invoqué serait donc emprisonné à l'intérieur... Et les Garlemaldais<var 1D /var>? Est-ce qu'ils ont montré des signes d'intérêt<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001250_BODYGUARD01623<tab>Sir. A Garlean airship was observed making an approach, but the vessel was destroyed when it drew near. The Empire appears to have made no subsequent attempts to reach the object.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001250_BODYGUARD01623<tab>Oui<var 1D /var>! Pas plus tard qu'hier, un aéronef de guerre a tenté d'approcher le cocon, mais il s'est fait abattre avant d'atteindre son objectif. Depuis, nous n'avons constaté aucun mouvement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001260_KANESENNA<tab>The soldiers who witnessed the incident spoke of a “lance of light” issuing from within the cocoon. Of an entire warship being reduced to smoking ruin in the space of a moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001260_KANESENNA<tab>Si l'on en croit le témoignage du soldat qui a assisté à la scène, un puissant rayon de lumière aurait émané du cocon, détruisant le système de propulsion du vaisseau...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001270_KANESENNA<tab>Veterans of Carteneau, meanwhile...likened the destruction to that wrought by the fiery wrath of Bahamut.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001270_KANESENNA<tab>Il a dit que cette scène lui avait rappelé le septième fléau, lorsque le dragon noir a répandu ses flammes destructrices sur le pays.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001280_ALISAIE<tab>We could face another Calamity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001280_ALISAIE<tab>Bahamut...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001290_ALPHINAUD<tab>So the primal is awake, then? Contained, yes, but for how long? We must destroy it now, lest it break free!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tout cela est très inquiétant... Le Primordial est prisonnier de son cocon, mais il est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment éveillé, ce qui veut donc dire qu'il peut en sortir à tout moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001300_CID<tab>Agreed. There is, however, the small matter of how to get close enough to a being that swats warships from the sky as you would a bothersome gnat...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001300_CID<tab>Le hic, c'est qu'on ne peut pas l'approcher sans prendre le risque de connaître le même sort que l'aéronef garlemaldais. Comment l'éliminer, du coup<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001310_NERO<tab>(-???-)Is this truly so complex a puzzle? Or have you no <var 1A 02 /var>stomach<var 1A 01 /var> for the obvious solution?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001310_NERO<tab>(-???-)Ah, si vous voyiez vos têtes en ce moment, c'est à tomber<var 1D /var>! Allez, déridez-vous<var 1D /var>! J'ai la solution à votre problème<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001320_CID<tab>What in the hells are <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> doing here!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001320_CID<tab>Toi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001330_NERO<tab>A pleasure to see you too, Garlond. Now, if you would be so kind as to explain to these good people why you should be <var 1A 02 /var>begging me<var 1A 01 /var> for my assistance, that would be most appreciated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001330_NERO<tab>Salut, Garlond<var 1D /var>! La forme<var 1D /var>? Dis, tu pourrais demander à ces sous-fifres de me laisser passer, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001340_AYMERIC<tab>Who is this man?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001340_AYMERIC<tab>Qui êtes-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001350_NERO<tab>Oh, how terrifically rude of me! Nero tol Scaeva, former tribunus of the XIVth Legion of the Garlean Empire. These days, however, one might say that I am something of a free agent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001350_NERO<tab>Oh, j'en oublie mes bonnes manières<var 1D /var>! Je m'appelle Nero tol Scaeva. Si mon nom vous est familier, c'est parce que je suis l'ex-commandant supérieur de la 14e légion impériale. Mais tout ça, c'est du passé<var 1D /var>! Aujourd'hui, je ne suis qu'un simple ingénieur indépendant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001360_CID<tab>What do you want, Nero?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001360_CID<tab>Tu n'as rien à faire ici<var 1D /var>! Va-t'en<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001370_NERO<tab>I was <var 1A 02 /var>getting<var 1A 01 /var> to that. Although you already know what I am about to propose, old friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001370_NERO<tab>Oh là, tout doux, tout doux... Écoute plutôt ce que j'ai à te dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001380_NERO<tab>As you have rather belatedly realized, within that frail binding lurks an entity alike in strength to the great Bahamut. And the only force in existence which might conceivably contend with such a foe is the very creation which captured the elder primal in the first place. I speak, of course, of Omega.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001380_NERO<tab>Le Primordial qui est à l'intérieur du cocon est du même calibre que Bahamut. Personne au monde, pas même <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière, n'est capable de vaincre une telle monstruosité. Non, le seul moyen d'en venir à bout, c'est d'utiliser Oméga.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001390_RAUBAHN<tab>Omega!? That hulk has been gathering dust beneath the plains of Carteneau since the Allagans breathed their last! And none alive knows how to wake it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001390_RAUBAHN<tab>Oméga<var 1D /var>!? Mais c'est impossible<var 1D /var>! Non seulement cette machine est enfouie sous terre, mais en plus elle est quasiment à l'état de fossile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001400_NERO<tab>I'm sorry─do you understand who it is with whom you have the privilege of speaking? I am Nero tol Scaeva, master engineer─the mechanical genius who restored the Ultima Weapon to full operational capacity!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001400_NERO<tab>Rien n'est impossible pour le génial Nero tol Scaeva<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001410_NERO<tab>And, as luck would have it, I am graciously offering you the use of my considerable expertise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001410_NERO<tab>Faites-moi confiance, j'ai déjà restauré l'Ultima Arma et je sais que je peux réitérer l'exploit avec Oméga.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001420_CID<tab>And, what, you just expect us to accept? Why would we trust the word of a man who furnished the Black Wolf with the means to subjugate Eorzea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001420_CID<tab>Pff<var 1D /var>! Comme si on pouvait faire confiance à un ancien général de l'armée impériale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001430_CID<tab>And, what, you just expect us to accept? You're a fool if you think your deeds at the Crystal Tower were enough to win my trust, Nero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001430_CID<tab>Te faire confiance<var 1D /var>? Parce que tu crois que j'ai oublié ce qui s'est passé à la Tour de Cristal, peut-être<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001440_NERO<tab>Trust? You wound me, Garlond! All those years studying side by side at the Academy, sharing both trial and triumph. We were countrymen, once, you and I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001440_NERO<tab>Tes paroles me déchirent le cœur, Garlond... Toi et moi, on se connaît depuis l'académie magitek, on partage la même passion indéfectible pour la science... On n'est pas si différents que ça, tu sais<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001450_NERO<tab>But sentiment aside─have you a better solution? Or do you mean to send in your vaunted hero there, as you always do, and pray the world is not engulfed in flame?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001450_NERO<tab>De toute manière, je doute que vous ayez une meilleure solution. C'est ça ou envoyer votre <var 08 E905 ((héroïne préférée)) ((héros préféré)) /var> au casse-pipe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001460_NERO<tab>Let us approach the problem in a rational manner. Does not the fact that Omega slumbers in stasis point to the existence of some overriding technology? A means of control?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001460_NERO<tab>Réfléchissez une minute. Le fait qu'Oméga soit dormante prouve qu'il est techniquement possible de la désactiver, et donc de la contrôler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001470_KANESENNA<tab>I would ask a question, if I may─Nero, was it not? In the event that we succeeded in using Omega to shackle the primal in the manner you propose, what then would become of it? Do we not risk repeating the mistakes of the Allagans?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001470_KANESENNA<tab>Messire Nero, en admettant que vous arriviez à capturer le Primordial à l'aide de cette machine, que ferez-vous ensuite<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qui nous garantit que vous ne ferez pas la même chose que les Allagois en leur temps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001480_NERO<tab>Omega is but a tool. How we choose to employ that tool is entirely up to us. Of course, if you would rather leave it buried beneath Carteneau while you continue your petty squabbles above, then I suppose that is also your choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001480_NERO<tab>Un outil est un outil, la question est de savoir comment vous l'utilisez. Après, si vous préférez continuer à couvrir le sol de Carteneau avec le sang de vos soldats, libre à vous de le faire... Hm<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001490_CID<tab>Spare us, Nero! The Seedseer's concern is a valid one. He who controls Omega wields the power of the gods. The very power which led the Allagans to destroy themselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001490_CID<tab>Surveille ton langage, Nero<var 1D /var>! N'oublie pas que tu t'adresses à l'Oracle de Gridania<var 1D /var>! Et je te signale que même si Oméga est dotée d'un dispositif de contrôle, ça n'enlève rien au fait qu'elle est commandée par des humains<var 1D /var>! Et c'est justement pour ça qu'elle est dangereuse<var 1D /var>! L'Histoire nous l'a déjà montré<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001500_NERO<tab>And does it not fall to we engineers to prevent such misuse? What was your company's proud slogan? “Freedom through Technology”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001500_NERO<tab>C'est pour éviter ce genre de dérive qu'il y a des ingénieurs, non<var 1D /var>? “Liberté grâce à la technologie”. Tu n'as quand même pas oublié le mot d'ordre de tes forges<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001510_CID<tab>Hah. A creed you follow, is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001510_CID<tab>Raaah, toi et ton sens de la repartie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001520_CID<tab><sigh> What say you? Do we take this villain at his word?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001520_CID<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu penses de tout ça, toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>He makes a convincing case.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je crois qu'on peut lui faire confiance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>No, but I'll keep an eye on him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>C'est risqué, mais qui ne tente rien n'a rien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001530_CID<tab>He makes me grind my teeth is what he does, but I suppose we don't have much of a choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001530_CID<tab>Ah... Je ne sais pas si c'est moi qui suis paranoïaque ou toi qui es trop crédule, mais toujours est-il que je vais me fier à ton jugement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001540_CID<tab>...As will I. I don't like it, but then it doesn't look like we have much choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001540_CID<tab>“Aux grands maux les grands remèdes”, hein<var 1D /var>! Bon, eh bien, y a plus qu'à y aller alors<var 1D /var>! Je compte sur toi pour couvrir mes arrières en cas de pépin, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001550_CID<tab>Would the council be willing to entrust this matter to a pair of former imperials?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001550_CID<tab>Si vous n'y voyez pas d'in<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>vé<var 16 /var>nient, j'aimerais que vous nous laissiez nous occuper d'Oméga.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001560_KANESENNA<tab>Yes. The task of restoring the Allagan relic will be yours. But the responsibility for its reawakening must remain with the council. Do we condone this course of action?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001560_KANESENNA<tab>C'est entendu. Cependant, je me refuse à vous laisser porter seuls ce fardeau. Pendant que vous vous chargez de réactiver cette machine, nous autres dirigeants déciderons de la res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té qu'implique son utilisation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001570_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye. 'Twould seem we do. Let the records show that we invest this contingent with the authority to enter Carteneau and take command of Omega.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001570_RAUBAHN<tab>Parfait<var 1D /var>! Cid, je te donne carte blanche pour cette opération.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001580_RAUBAHN<tab>Cid, I appoint you leader of the expedition. Scions─I would ask that you assign some few of your number to escort Master Garlond and supervise the other one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001580_RAUBAHN<tab>Toutefois, j'aimerais que tu sois accompagné par les Héritiers, pour te protéger mais aussi pour surveiller les agissements de Nero.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001590_ALPHINAUD<tab>We should be happy to oblige. The politics of Carteneau being what they are, I daresay our neutrality will prove useful in avoiding any unnecessary entanglements.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Très bien. La plaine de Carteneau est une région sous juridiction spéciale, mais comme notre or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion est neutre vis-à-vis des trois Cités, nous aurons plus de facilité à justifier la présence de civils en ces lieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001600_ALISAIE<tab>If I am not mistaken, Doma occupies a similarly neutral position. Might we not persuade you to join the expedition, Lady Yugiri? If you suspected any foul play from Nero, you would be welcome to kill him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001600_ALISAIE<tab>Dame Yugiri, est-ce que cela vous dérangerait de les accompagner<var 1D /var>? Je sais qu'en cas de besoin, vous n'hésiterez pas à piquer de vos dagues le dos de ce malotru.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001610_YUGIRI<tab>My blade is yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001610_YUGIRI<tab>Avec grand plaisir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001620_NERO<tab>Not a moment's hesitation, eh? You'll forgive me if I do not shake your hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001620_NERO<tab>Une main de fer dans un gant de velours, mmm... Je sens que nous allons bien nous entendre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001630_NERO<tab>Hm. So these are the fabled headquarters of the Scions... I confess, I would have expected an order of self-proclaimed warrior-scholars to surround themselves with the fruits of man's enlightenment. And yet there is not so much as a single piece of magitek in sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001630_NERO<tab>Voilà donc le quartier général des Héritiers de la Septième Aube... Je dois dire que je m'attendais à quelque chose de plus moderne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001640_NERO<tab>It never ceases to amaze me how primitive you Eorzeans truly are...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001640_NERO<tab>Décidément, les Éorzéens sont vraiment à la ramasse pour tout ce qui a trait à la technologie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001650_TATARU<tab>Hmph! I'll have you know that the Rising Stones is home to the very latest in magitek innovation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001650_TATARU<tab>Dites donc<var 1D /var>! Je vous ferai remarquer que le Refuge des roches est à la pointe de la technologie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001660_TATARU<tab>Wedge calls it the “Mark XIV Thermocoil Boilmaster,” and it's the finest kettle I've ever had the pleasure to own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001660_TATARU<tab>Regardez un peu cette bouilloire magitek que Wedge m'a fabriquée<var 1D /var>! Je suis sûre que vous n'avez rien d'aussi moderne que ce “céruthermobouilleur v14” dans votre pays<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001670_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Désolé pour l'attente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, Yda and I, at least. Y'shtola and the others remained behind to continue their assessment of the binding magick.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Y'shtola, Krile et Thancred sont restés à Sombrelinceul afin de poursuivre leur analyse du cocon de lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001690_YDA<tab>There didn't seem much point staying just for that, so I decided to come back with Alphinaud. Papalymo bought us this time. We shouldn't waste it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001690_YDA<tab>Moi, j'ai préféré suivre Alphinaud... Papalymo s'est sacrifié pour nous permettre de gagner un temps précieux, et je n'ai pas envie de le gâcher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001700_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)By your leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001700_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Salutations<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001710_ALISAIE<tab>Good gods. That voice could fell a gigas...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001710_ALISAIE<tab>C'est qui, ce pachyderme<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001720_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)This is the Rising Stones, domicile of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn? I enter at the invitation of one Lord Urianger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001720_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Pardonnez l'intrusion, mais je suis à la recherche des Héritiers... de... la Septième Aube<var 1D /var>! Sire Urianger m'a dit que je pourrais les trouver au Refuge... des roches...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001730_GOSETSU<tab>(-Towering Traveler-)Ho-ho! I spy you there, shadow walker. You always were a hard one to find!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001730_GOSETSU<tab>(-Colosse à la tenue orientale-)Hmmm<var 1D /var>? Ne serait-ce pas... Yugiri<var 1D /var>!? Non, je ne rêve pas, c'est bien toi<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001740_ALISAIE<tab>Yugiri...? Do you know this man?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001740_ALISAIE<tab>Vous... Vous connaissez cet individu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001750_YUGIRI<tab>Gosetsu!? Why are you come to Eorzea?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001750_YUGIRI<tab>Gosetsu<var 1D /var>!? Mais que fais-tu ici<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001760_GOSETSU<tab>In search of you, Yugiri! For days and nights did I row across the angry sea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001760_GOSETSU<tab>Je suis venu tout droit de Doma pour te chercher<var 1D /var>! Ah, tu n'as pas idée du nombre d'épreuves que j'ai dû surmonter pour te trouver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001770_GOSETSU<tab>I made port in good spirits, only for my own flesh to betray me over the trifling matter of an empty belly! Collapsed in the street like an unfed stray, I was, until Lord Urianger came to my aid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001770_GOSETSU<tab>J'ai ramé des jours et des jours, sans boire ni manger... Tant et si bien que lorsque j'ai finalement atteint la terre ferme, je n'étais plus du tout en état de marcher<var 1D /var>! Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que ce brave Urianger était là, car sans lui, j'y serais cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment resté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001780_GOSETSU<tab>Over a most welcome meal, we spoke of the plight of Doma, and I learned of our displaced countrymen's work to resettle this blighted land. 'Twas blind fortune I was able to locate you so swiftly!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001780_GOSETSU<tab>D'ailleurs, c'est en discutant avec lui autour d'un bon repas que j'ai appris que des Domiens s'étaient installés dans cette région. Il m'a également dit que les... les Héritiers de la Septième Aube pourraient me conduire jusqu'à toi, et c'est pourquoi j'ai entrepris ce voyage jusqu'au... Glas des revenants<var 1D /var>! La suite, tu la connais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001790_GOSETSU<tab>But now we must make ready to depart! Our master languishes in dire peril, and Doma calls her daughter home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001790_GOSETSU<tab>Bon, assez parlé<var 1D /var>! Tu dois préparer tes affaires, Yugiri. Notre seigneur court un grave danger, et nous devons nous rendre à ses côtés le plus vite possible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001800_YUGIRI<tab>It is not so simple, Gosetsu. There are obligations which bind me here...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001800_YUGIRI<tab>Je suis désolée, Gosetsu, mais je ne peux pas rentrer tout de suite... J'ai une mission à accomplir ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001810_GOSETSU<tab>You─ You <var 1A 02 /var>refuse<var 1A 01 /var>? Did you mislay your oath during your flight from our homeland? The laws of hospitality must be honored, but surely the vow to defend your master demands the greater obeisance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001810_GOSETSU<tab>Je conçois que tu aies des obligations envers les Éorzéens, mais la vie de ton seigneur est menacée<var 1D /var>! N'oublie pas que tu as une énorme dette d'honneur vis-à-vis de lui<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001820_YUGIRI<tab>It was our master who bid me guide our people to safe haven by any means necessary. And it was the Scions you see before you who provided us succor and sanctuary when all others refused.

Dire peril or no, were I to return without first repaying such “hospitality,” our master would cut me down at the threshold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001820_YUGIRI<tab>Je sais bien... mais au moment de quitter le pays, ce même seigneur m'a ordonné de protéger ses sujets à tout prix. Et si autant de Domiens sont en vie aujourd'hui, c'est es<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tiel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment grâce aux Héritiers. Ce serait le couvrir de déshonneur que de rentrer sans payer cette dette<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001830_GOSETSU<tab>Mayhap that is so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001830_GOSETSU<tab>Hmmm... C'est pas faux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001840_YUGIRI<tab>There is more. A crisis threatens all within this realm, Eorzean and Doman alike, and I go to play my part in its resolution. I will not bring shame upon our liege by abandoning my people or my duty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001840_YUGIRI<tab>Qui plus est, la sécurité des sujets dont on m'a confié la res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té est aujourd'hui compromise. C'est pour cela que je dois rester<var 1D /var>! Si je pars en abandonnant ma mission et mes compatriotes, notre seigneur ne me le pardonnera jamais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001850_NERO<tab>How very noble of you. Now, in the name of honor, kinship, and─ah, yes─<var 1A 02 /var>practicality<var 1A 01 /var>, might I suggest we get this expedition underway? Or would you rather debate the finer points of duty and leave Omega to the <var 1A 02 /var>Empire<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001850_NERO<tab>Dites, vous en avez encore pour longtemps<var 1D /var>? Au cas où vous l'auriez oublié, les Garlemaldais cherchent à s'emparer d'Oméga<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001860_GOSETSU<tab>The Empire!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001860_GOSETSU<tab>Les Garlemaldais<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001870_GOSETSU<tab>Yugiri? You draw steel against the curs of Garlemald?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001870_GOSETSU<tab>Yugiri, l'ennemi que tu cherches à abattre est l'empire de Garlemald<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001880_GOSETSU<tab>Then why did you not say so!? My blade is oathbound to fall upon the ranks of the imperials wheresoever they march! Lead on, shadow walker. And may the enemy tremble at our coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001880_GOSETSU<tab>Pourquoi tu ne me l'as pas dit plus tôt<var 1D /var>!? Cette information change tout<var 1D /var>! J'aiguise mes sabres depuis des lunes dans le seul et unique but de tailler en pièces ces crapules<var 1D /var>! Allons im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment sur le champ de bataille, et montrons-leur ce qu'est une bravoure sans faille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001890_NERO<tab>Now where was the...? Ah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001890_NERO<tab>Reste plus qu'à enclencher ça... Et hop<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001900_NERO<tab>I've enabled the teleporter. One brief jump, and we shall arrive in Omega's control room.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001900_NERO<tab>Le téléporteur est activé. Je l'ai configuré pour qu'il nous conduise directement dans la salle de contrôle d'Oméga.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001910_CID<tab>How convenient. ...You've been here before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001910_CID<tab>Tu sembles drôlement familier avec ce dispositif... Avoue, ce n'est pas la première fois que tu viens ici, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001920_NERO<tab>Of course. 'Twas no easy task threading a path through all the skirmishers...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001920_NERO<tab>Ouais<var 1D /var>! Et crois-moi, ça n'a pas été une mince affaire de passer la ligne de front sans me faire repérer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001930_NERO<tab>But how could I ignore the existence of such a fascinating toy! You may trust that my preliminary examination was suitably thorough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001930_NERO<tab>Enfin, j'étais prêt à tout pour voir ce gros joujou... Et j'en ai profité pour l'inspecter dans les moindres recoins<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001940_CID<tab>Trust? Aye. I trust your appetite for technology.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001940_CID<tab>Et après ça tu voudrais qu'on te fasse confiance, pff<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... D'un autre côté, je suis forcé d'admettre que ta soif de con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce est tout à fait remarquable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001950_GRYNEWAHT<tab>I chase down a suspect airship, and who should I find but the traitor, Cid Garlond!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001950_GRYNEWAHT<tab>Tiens donc<var 1D /var>! Je ne m'attendais pas à tomber sur l'infâme Cid Garlond en poursuivant cet aéronef<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001960_GRYNEWAHT<tab>Searching for something, engineer? Something big? It's close, isn't it!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001960_GRYNEWAHT<tab>Et si l'ingénieur de génie se trouve ici, c'est que je ne dois plus être bien loin de mon objectif, alors<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001970_GRYNEWAHT<tab>Bwahahahaha! It's like all my namedays have come at once!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001970_GRYNEWAHT<tab>Ah ha ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! J'y croyais plus, mais voilà que la chance me sourit enfin<var 1D /var>!!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001980_NERO<tab>Of all the scouts the Empire could have sent...
Take care of that brute, will you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001980_NERO<tab>Merde<var 1D /var>! J'aurais dû me douter que l'Empire enverrait des groupes d'éclaireurs dans la région... Eh, champion<var 08 E905 ((ne)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! C'est le moment ou jamais de t'illustrer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001990_CID<tab>Godsdammit, I can't let Nero tinker around in there by himself. Sorry to leave you to it─but I daresay you'll manage without me. This clod has no idea who he's dealing with...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_001990_CID<tab>Cet enfoiré s'est téléporté sans moi<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Excusez-moi, les gars, je ne peux pas le laisser seul à l'intérieur de la machine<var 1D /var>! Je vous laisse vous occuper de ces lascars<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002000_GOSETSU<tab>I am Gosetsu, samurai of Doma! You will rue your choice of opponent this day!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002000_GOSETSU<tab>Je m'appelle Gosetsu et je suis un illustre samouraï de Doma<var 1D /var>! En garde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002010_NERO<tab>Temporal stasis disengaged. All systems operational─Garlond?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002010_NERO<tab>Le système de chronostasie est désactivé<var 1D /var>! Tous les voyants sont au vert<var 1D /var>! Et toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002020_CID<tab>All clear on this side! It's waking up...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002020_CID<tab>Tout est bon de mon côté<var 1D /var>! Oméga va se réveiller<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002030_NERO<tab>Remarkable! Omega's sensors immediately detected the presence of the cocoon even at this distance. They must have been set to scan for sources of energy exceeding certain magnitudes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002030_NERO<tab>Regarde ça, elle a déjà détecté le cocon de lumière<var 1D /var>! Héhéhé... Cette machine est un véritable bijou de technologie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002040_CID<tab>I still don't see any means to control the machine directly. It seems to have been designed to act wholly autonomously... Hmm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002040_CID<tab>Ouais, mais contrairement à l'Ultima Arma, elle est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment autonome, ce qui veut dire qu'on ne pourra pas la contrôler...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002050_CID<tab>Once we release Omega, we can be fairly certain it will attempt to capture the primal at Baelsar's Wall. Assuming its mission is successful, our only option at that point will be to reengage its stasis system and put it back to sleep.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002050_CID<tab>Aussitôt qu'Oméga sera opérationnelle, elle se dirigera au<var 16 /var>to<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>que<var 16 /var>ment vers le cocon de lumière pour le capturer. La seule chose qu'on pourra faire ensuite, c'est rétablir la chronostase pour l'arrêter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002060_NERO<tab>And should the machine happen to misbehave, we'll simply initiate an emergency shutdown. I confess, we don't yet have a <var 1A 02 /var>complete<var 1A 01 /var> grasp of its capabilities, but I'm certain the details will not elude us for long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002060_NERO<tab>Bah<var 1D /var>! Si jamais y a un problème, on aura qu'à utiliser le dispositif d'arrêt d'urgence. Je n'ai pas eu le temps de vérifier la procédure à appliquer, mais je suis sûr qu'on trouvera un moyen. Après tout, on est des génies, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002070_YDA<tab>Well...I understood less than half of that. So─my question to you is: are we doing the right thing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002070_YDA<tab>Je ne comprends pas la moitié de ce qu'ils disent, mais je commence à me demander si ce n'est pas un peu dangereux, tout ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Well, what do you think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu ferais, toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Is there any other way?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu devrais peut-être intervenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002080_YDA<tab>What do <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> think...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002080_YDA<tab>Tu me demandes de décider<var 1D /var>? À moi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002090_YDA<tab>I...suppose not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002090_YDA<tab>Intervenir, moi<var 1D /var>!? Mais... je ne suis même pas sûre de ce que je veux faire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002100_YDA<tab>All right. Step aside, Cid. Is this the thing I need to press?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002100_YDA<tab>Très bien<var 1D /var>! J'ai pris ma décision<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Pousse-toi, Cid. C'est ce bouton-là, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002110_CID<tab>Uh...yes. That's the one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002110_CID<tab>Euh, oui...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002120_YDA<tab>You gave too much for us to waste this chance, Papalymo. So, this is for you...and me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002120_YDA<tab>Papalymo s'est sacrifié pour nous offrir cette opportunité, et je ne veux surtout pas la laisser passer. C'est pourquoi je prends la res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té d'appuyer sur ce bouton<var 1D /var>! Pour moi, et pour lui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002130_NERO<tab>Hahahahahahahaha! Yes! Fly free, my pretty! Show us what you can do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002130_NERO<tab>Ha ha<var 1D /var>! Allez, vas-y ma belle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002140_CID<tab>The launch sequence has begun. Omega is loose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002140_CID<tab>La séquence de lancement est achevée<var 1D /var>! Oméga va bouger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002150_CID<tab>Hm? Omega has stopped transmitting. But that shouldn't be, I─I didn't engage the stasis system.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002150_CID<tab>Oméga ne répond plus<var 1D /var>! C'est étrange, le système de chronostasie n'est pourtant pas activé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002160_GOSETSU<tab>And what does this signify? I have little understanding of these contrivances...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002160_GOSETSU<tab>Quelqu'un peut-il m'expliquer ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>!? Je ne comprends rien à tout votre charabia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002170_NERO<tab>The launch went exactly to plan, but all signals emanating from Omega have ceased. This may indicate any number of things, but we will need to join the Scions out in the field if we are to ascertain which one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002170_NERO<tab>On a perdu le contact avec Oméga, voilà ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>! Plutôt que de croupir ici, je propose qu'on retourne voir les autres pour qu'ils nous fassent part de leurs observations.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002180_CID<tab>Right, I've ordered the malfunctioning beast to go to sleep. That should prevent any unfortunate mishaps. I suggest we make our way back to Gridania.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002180_CID<tab>Voilà, j'ai réactivé le système de chronostasie. Normalement, ça devrait nous mettre à l'abri d'un emballement brutal. Bon<var 1D /var>! En route pour Gridania<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002190_YDA<tab>Omega destroyed the cocoon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002190_YDA<tab>Oméga a tué le Primordial...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002200_YDA<tab>Papalymo's spell is fading. It was bound to his aether, you see...and if the connection is broken...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002200_YDA<tab>La magie de Papalymo est en train de disparaître de ce monde... Je le sais, car le lien qui nous unissait s'est rompu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>My friends... I cannot well express how glad I am to see you both unharmed. They say that Omega's clash with the primal shook the very firmament...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai entendu dire qu'une terrible bataille a eu lieu. Vous n'avez pas été touchées, j'espère<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002220_YSHTOLA<tab>You need not have worried─the battle took place far above the ground. We were able to observe in relative safety, though I am given to understand that there were casualties on the far side of the Wall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002220_YSHTOLA<tab>Non, nous n'avons aucun blessé à déplorer ici. Il semblerait toutefois qu'il y ait eu des victimes de l'autre côté de la Muraille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002230_KRILE<tab>It was like watching a nightmare unfold before our very eyes. Ilberd's primal manifested in the form of a colossal dragon─a being of pure violence. It burst forth from the cocoon with such terrible force...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002230_KRILE<tab>C'était une vision cauchemardesque<var 1D /var>! Un dragon gigantesque a jailli du cocon de lumière<var 1D /var>! Il était si furieux, si enragé... On aurait dit qu'il était mû par la seule volonté de détruire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03500_002240_ALPHINAUD<tab>That such a horror should spring from the eyes of Nidhogg comes as no surprise. Nor do I wonder at its form. Ilberd all but announced it in the moments prior to his death. Plainly, it was his dying wish to visit a second Calamity upon the Empire.
